name: Cyber Curse (Azumet, Myles)
description:
Made as part of the GMTK Game Jam 2021

An endless FPS where you defend computer components you're joined to against malicious entities determined to destroy them!

Defend each of the components you're tethered to, or the game ends!

Controls:
Movement = WASD

Shoot = Left Click

Zoom = Right Click

Dash = Shift

Pause = Escape

Developed by:
Myles Vanevery

Jake Hardy

Assets Used:
Powerful Sword Pack by Grruzam
Sci-Fi Guns SFX Pack by Mikael Vanninen
SciFi Gun Collection by Black Curtain Studio
Alien Solider by Mixamo
SciFantasy Sword Pack by Robert Benkendorf
